name: tracey gooden
text: I think about this pizza once a week. I wish I could fly there right now just for a slice of pizza.I swear the best pizza I've ever had.

name: Gilberte Holcombe
text: It was pretty good pizza, but nothing too spectacular.

name: Weedy Guitar Studio
text: Very good taste like it was made in Italy big thumbs up

name: Yasmin Parkman
text: Staff is very outgoing and friendly.

name: Robert Cornett
text: Great pizza pre-orders have always been correct and ready with the time specified

name: Tom Burns
text: Called in an order over 45 minutes before I got to the Alderson Little General/Godfathers Pizza.  Went inside to get my pizza, and it had been sold to someone else.!!!  Totally unacceptable.!!!!  I expect nothing more though, from this store or any others in Alderson.

name: Larry Harris
text: Nothing wrong with this place. I just don't like there food here and there prices are a little high for what you get.

name: stacy Bennett
text: At 5 there was nothing in hot case but  2 pepperoni  and 3 chease sticks but was told I was free to wait and she would make one what a joke no wonder there not making money there

name: Josh Laxton
text: Great food and staff are A+
